item.title: BlackRock Sells $2.5 Billion Bond to Fund Preqin Purchase
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A unit of BlackRock Inc. sold $2.5 billion of US investment-grade bonds on Wednesday to help fund a portion of the firm’s $3.2 billion acquisition of private-markets data business Preqin. BlackRock Funding Inc. priced notes in three parts, according to a person familiar with the matte...

item.title: ECB’s Inflation Endgame at Risk Over Productivity Challenge
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A key plank in the European Central Bank’s case for inflation returning to 2% faces growing skepticism — potentially damping hopes for sustained cuts in interest rates. For consumer-price gains to retreat to the ECB’s target as envisaged late next year, an increase in productivity mus...

item.title: Bitcoin unter Druck: Steht eine Wende bevor?
